briefdescription.para: Sets up the TrustRegion solver with the provided settings and checks feasibility.

briefdescription.para: Trust Region solver for non-linear optimization problems.

detaileddescription.para: Refer to [3] for details of the algorithm.
This code is heavily inspired by the trust-region implementation of Manopt.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the nonlinear operator to solve.
Type of preconditioner to use (default is IncompleteCholesky).
Type of the update function
